descriptionHtml:
[youtube]JmwECPlaMDc[/youtube]

Name: AlexScorpion\'s Shop
Version: 1.1a
Date: 19/1/2013
Category: Weapons 
Author(s): AlexScorpion
Source: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30131

Description
===========
My mods Compliation.

Location
========
Across the main entrance of WhiteRun. Check the screens.

Details
=======
Armors and weapons made by me will be from now on sold in my shop.

Install
=======
Use Nexus mod manager

Uninstall
=========
Use nexus mod manager.


History
=======

19-01-2013:

-Snake bow long 
-Snake bow short
-cane sword
-cane dagger

18-08-2013
- made all weapons upgradeable
- added money to the vendor
- the vendor can now buy stolen goods
11/9/2013
 - Added green poison haze to the bows
 - Fixed the merchant
Contact
=======

You can find me on the official Elder Scrolls forums as AlexScorpion
You can find me on TESNexus as AlexScorpion


Credits
=======
Thanks to Weijesen for green haze fx.
Thanks to Cipscis and M3rvin for the automatic light switch script.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to TESNexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to God for creating us all.

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
3D Studio Max - http://www.autodesk.com/3dsmax
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
Photoshop - http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/
TESsnip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2114
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============


You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod. If I do not respond within 2 weeks, feel free to do whatever you
like with this mod.
author: AlexScorpion
